---

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### <mark style="background-color: #FFFF00">**Note: the code is for EXPERIMENTAL USE ONLY, NOT PRODUCTION READY**</mark>

::: panel-tabset
## Data Setup

```{r setup, message=FALSE}
#| code-fold: show

library(scda)
library(dplyr)
library(rlistings)

adae <- synthetic_cdisc_dataset("rcd_2022_10_13", "adae")

out <- adae %>%
  select(AESOC, AEDECOD, AETERM) %>%
  unique()

var_labels(out) <- c(
  AESOC = "MedDRA System Organ Class",
  AEDECOD = "MedDRA Preferred Term",
  AETERM = "Investigator-Specified\nAdverse Event Term"
)
```

## Standard Listing

```{r}
lsting <- as_listing(
  out,
  key_cols = c("AESOC", "AEDECOD"),
  disp_cols = names(out),
  main_title = "Listing of Preferred Terms and Investigator-Specified Adverse Event Terms"
)

head(lsting, 20)
```
:::
